entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
